caption.center: James Slaughter REED v. Catherine M. REED.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Chancery Court, Humphreys County; Nathan P. Adams, Jr., Chancellor.
opinion.attorneys:
James W. Newman, III, W.O. Dillard, Jackson, for appellant.
Howard Dyer, III, Rabun Jones, Dyer, Dyer Dyer, Greenville, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before PATTERSON, C.J., and PRATHER and SULLIVAN, JJ.
